text: Matthew Russell Wood (born August 15, 1972) is an American voice actor. ==Roles== He is known for playing General Griveous in Star Wars Episode III: Revenge of the Sith and Star Wars: The Clone Wars. He has also played Bib Fortuna in The Book of Boba Fett, Star Wars: The Bad Batch, The Mandalorian, and Star Wars Episode I: The Phantom Menace, as well as many other roles related to the Star Wars series. Wood also had smaller roles in Robot Chicken, What’s New, Scooby-Doo?, Knives Out, Next Gen, Olaf’s Frozen Adventure, The Emoji Movie, Smurfs: The Lost Village, and Star Trek Into Darkness. title: Matthew Wood
